FieldTypes

HtmlHelper.CSSHiddens
          private enum used to compare to analyze presentation semantics encoded within CSS relating only to whether or not a field is visible; each value consists of a CSS property and its corresponding value
NextNavigator
          Class for encoding the Next Links navigated to (in a nested fashion) within a single scraping environment.
NextXQueryFactory
          Class that builds objects for Next Link type XQuery expressions
OXPathExpression
          abstract class that contains common state and method info for the GroundedOXPathExpression and UnGroundedOXPathExpression classes
PathObject
          Simple class for associating path AST with their respective URLs
QueryToken.TokenType
          enum encoding token types
ScraperXQueryFactory
          Class that builds objects to produce scrapper XQuery expressions
TermHelper.TermTypes
          enum describing the different types of terms that can be referenced in the selection part of an OXPathExpression
UnGroundedOXPathExpression
          class is deliberately made separate from GroundedOXPathExpression to force user to consider what type of OXPathExpression they have
XQueryFactory
          Abstract class that provides objects, methods, and constants for XQuerys, which in turn support the info scraping function of the OXPath framework.
